title: Pokemon Sapphire Version / Pokemon Ruby Version
description: Defeat Team Aqua and Team Magma! ·Tips for winning the Pokémon Contests ·Locations to all Secret Bases and Battle Towers ·Thorough Pokédex, featuring Ruby and Sapphire Pokémon, with locations, statistics, and skills ·Strategy to win all 2-on-2 battles and beat all enemy Pokémon Trainers ·Complete walkthrough of the vast new Pokémon world, including all cities, towns, streets, and dungeons ·Detailed moves list ·Tips to capturing, evolving, and customizing your Pokémon ·Detailed charts for Technical and Hidden Machines
author: Elizabeth M. Hollinger
